dt: {bc}a several-celled reddish berry that is about the size of an orange with a thick leathery skin and many seeds with pulpy crimson arils of tart flavor
{bc}a widely cultivated tropical Asian tree ({it}Punica granatum{/it} of the family Punicaceae) bearing {a_link|pomegranates}

et: Middle English {it}poumgrenet{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}pome garnette{/it}, literally, seedy fruit
shortdef: a several-celled reddish berry that is about the size of an orange with a thick leathery skin and many seeds with pulpy crimson arils of tart flavor
a widely cultivated tropical Asian tree (Punica granatum of the family Punicaceae) bearing pomegranates
